text:
[Verse]
Lost in the stars tonight
Searching for a guiding light
Hearts racing out of sight
Taking off on this flight

[Verse 2]
Dancing in cosmic glow
Feet hardly touch below
Everywhere we go
Feeling the magic flow

[Chorus]
Oh oh shine so bright
In the galaxy tonight
Oh oh it's all we need
Together we are free

[Verse 3]
Celestial dreams in mind
Infinite paths to find
Leaving the world behind
To the stars we're aligned

[Bridge]
Weightless we drift so high
Riding waves through the sky
Never asking why
Just you and I

[Chorus]
Oh oh shine so bright
In the galaxy tonight
Oh oh it's all we need
Together we are free
title: Lost in the Stars
